## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to process the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event.
